2747 a simplifi recombin scheme for the fibonacci buddi system a simplifi recombin scheme for the fibonacci buddi system which requir neither tabl nor repetit calcul and us onli two addit bit per buffer is present cacm june 1975 cranston b thoma r fibonacci buddi system dynam storag alloc buddi system 3 89 4 32 4 39 ca750606 jb januari 9 1978 1 07 pm 2596 4 2747 2747 4 2747 2768 4 2747 2845 4 2747 2902 4 2747 2911 4 2747 2955 4 2747 2435 5 2747 2747 5 2747 2747 5 2747 2747 5 2747 2773 5 2747 2845 5 2747 2902 5 2747 2955 5 2747 1051 6 2747 1062 6 2747 1184 6 2747 1184 6 2747 1184 6 2747 1211 6 2747 1552 6 2747 1879 6 2747 2435 6 2747 2435 6 2747 2435 6 2747 2596 6 2747 2596 6 2747 2598 6 2747 2734 6 2747 2736 6 2747 2747 6 2747 2747 6 2747 2747 6 2747 2747 6 2747 2768 6 2747 2768 6 2747 2773 6 2747
